title: Push Day
text:

title: Leg Day
text:
GOAL: Moderate (8-12 reps) to low (15-20 reps) weight. Reach failure, then grind (essentially slow down) while maintaining form.

Calf raises (machine, with barbell)
Leg press
Leg extension
Leg curl
Hip abduction (in/out)
Bulgarian split squats (one leg on bench, one leg out, hold weight while bending knee)
Barbell squats
